a beautifully crafted strategyrpg hybrid  the core gameplay is straightforward explore the world find that one army that youre barely able to defeat at any given point and beat it  imo you can only really appreciate this game at higher difficulty levels at hard and impossible the odds are stacked so heavily against you that you can only win by milking every tiny advantage to the fullest but when you do win its glorious  the lovely cartoony 3d art has aged surprisingly well
